                        npcs[i].textUpdate = ">=D";

item.title: Making text above head
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

This is a delta base source.

i added this under my process() in my NPCHandler class.

if (npcs[i].npcType == 584) { { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Rare shop"; } }

I spawn that npc and there is nothing saying “Rare shop”. Why won’t this work?

Read full topic
